com.zeitheron.hammercore.utils

Class AnnotatedInstanceUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zeitheron.hammercore.utils.AnnotatedInstanceUtil

  • public class AnnotatedInstanceUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps to gather all required scopes of needed object with specified annotation

    • Method Detail

      • getTypes

        public static <T> java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends T>> getTypes(@Nonnull
                                                                        net.minecraftforge.fml.common.discovery.ASMDataTable asmDataTable,
                                                                        java.lang.Class annotationClass,
                                                                        java.lang.Class<T> typeClass)
        Gets all classes that extend (or implement) typeClass and have annotationClass annotation present
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of base class
        Parameters:
        asmDataTable - the ASM table with all loaded classes (get it via FMLPreInitializationEvent.getAsmData())
        annotationClass - the annotation that must be present in the class for it to be added to the list
        typeClass - the class that object must extend in order for it to be added to the list
        Returns:
        all matched classes

      • getInstances

        public static <T> java.util.List<T> getInstances(@Nonnull
                                                 net.minecraftforge.fml.common.discovery.ASMDataTable asmDataTable,
                                                 java.lang.Class annotationClass,
                                                 java.lang.Class<T> instanceClass)
        Gets (well, creates) all scopes of classes that extend (or implement) instanceClass and have annotationClass annotation present
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of base class
        Parameters:
        asmDataTable - the ASM table with all loaded classes (get it via FMLPreInitializationEvent.getAsmData())
        annotationClass - the annotation that must be present in the class for it to be added to the list
        instanceClass - the class that object must extend in order for it to be added to the list
        Returns:
        All found classes, converted to instances

      • getMCFBInstances

                                                     java.lang.Class<T> instanceClass)
